short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Listings, Prices, Reviews, and more from Walmart, with options to export in formats such as CSV, Excel, JSON, and others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Walmart Data Extractor & Downloader - Export Product Data to CSV/Excel/JSON

Overview:
This powerful Walmart data extraction tool enables you to automatically download and convert product listings, details, reviews, and prices into multiple formats including CSV, Excel, and JSON. Our scraper extracts detailed information from Walmart.com and its international sites, making it the perfect tool for data analysts, researchers, developers, and marketers.

Key Features:
✓ Extract data from product pages, search results, and cart information
✓ Export to multiple formats: CSV, Excel (XLSX), JSON, XML
✓ Automatic pagination and data collection
✓ Support for multiple Walmart regional sites (US, Canada, Mexico)
✓ Premium users get unlimited rate limits

What Data You Can Extract:
• Product Information
- Complete product details
- Pricing data
- Availability status
- Product images
• Reviews & Ratings
- Customer reviews
- Ratings
• Shopping Cart
- Cart items
- Cart totals

Perfect For:
Data Analysis: Extract product data for market research and pricing analysis
Marketing Research: Monitor product trends and customer sentiment
Development: Integrate Walmart data into your applications and systems

Export Format Support:
• CSV - Perfect for spreadsheet analysis
• Excel (XLSX) - Formatted with proper data types
• JSON - Ideal for developers
• HTML Table - Easy to read and analyze
• XML - Structured data export
• TXT - Plain text format
• Raw JSON - Complete data access

Supported Countries/Sites:
• walmart.com (United States)
• walmart.ca (Canada)
• walmart.com.mx (Mexico)

Known Limitations:
• Rate limits apply for non-Premium users
• Requires Chromium-based browser
• Requires user authentication

Technical Support:
Need assistance? Contact us: hello@nifty.codes

Privacy & Security:
Your login credentials are required to use this extension but are kept strictly confidential and never disclosed to third parties.
Exported data is formatted on our servers and never stored.
